translations.fr:

Vous atteignez le centre du village, mais il s'av√®re qu'il est tr√®s petit et qu'il n'y a que deux commerces : la bijouterie et une auberge . translations.en:
: ** At some point in your journey, you arrive in a charming little village. You reach the center of the village, however it turns out that there are only two shops: a jewelry store and an inn. You learn from a bystander that the jewelry is held by an old man. It is a well known fact that he makes beautiful jewellery such as necklaces and rings. As for the inn run by a couple, it seems pretty successful

:speaking_head: Go and have a talk with the jeweller
:money_with_wings: Try to rob the jeweller
:house_with_garden: Go to rest at the inn
:person_walking: Continue your journey

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
